siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Financially Minded Listener, Thanks for tuning in for Episode 8! This week Jon met his mortgage savings goal so he seeks advice from the most experienced guy he knows - Stan Lemon (who has gone through the process 6 times.) Stan drops some knowledge and points out someâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Episode 8 - If you don't buy milkshakes with your money, save for a house!
